title: Party member achieved an "S" rating - Party did not get a box

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I (Dereks) was in a party with my wife (Emily Bot) and she got an "S" rating. After winning the match neither of us got a chest. The last chest I won was yesterday, my client shows that I can till win 2 more. She has not gotten a chest in a while and the Profile-Overview shows that she can still win 3 more.

Does it not award one instantly sometimes? Is there a certain period of time we have to wait before it awards us with the chest or was this a bug?

Thanks!

replies.body: It looks like you two didn't get chests for that match because you have both already received chests for Garen and Alistar this season. Be sure to check up the other details on how you can get [**hextech chests**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide), as you can only get one chest per champion each season.
Thanks for the info! I didnt know it was 1 per champion per season, just thought it was all time based.
